system.description:
This spell creates a large ball of light with a 30' diameter, similar to bright torchlight. If cast on an object, the light moves with it. If cast at a creature’s eyes, the target must save vs. spells or be blinded until the spell ends. If the saving throw succeeds, the light appears behind the target.

The reverse, darkness, creates a 30' diameter circle of darkness that blocks all sight except infravision. Darkness can counter light and vice-versa. If cast at a creature’s eyes, the target must save vs. spells or be blinded until the effect ends.
